Key Match Events: Aaron Jones smashed 10 sixes in a stunning 94 not out
WICKET! USA 173-3 (Gous c Johnson b Dutta 65)
WICKET! USA 42-2 (Monank c Movva b Heyliger 16)
WICKET! Canada 159-4 (Kirton c Anderson b Ali Khan 51)
WICKET! Canada 128-3 (Dhaliwal c Jasdeep b Anderson 61)
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Jones played the innings of his life, hitting 10 sixes in a monumental unbeaten 94 from only 40 balls.
Before today, Jones' scores in T20 internationals this year were 3, 34*, 15, 2, 4, 35 and 2. Who needs form?
USA win the toss and bowl
Post-Match Reflections: The player of the match is Aaron Jones
That’s a huge blow to the USA. Kaleem strikes second ball!

The magnificent Aaron Jones finishes the game in a hurry. He reverse-sweeps Dutta for four, slog-sweeps the next ball for six – it was palmed over the rope by the fielder – and then slog-sweeps another to finish the job. What an amazing innings!
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Jones is batting magnificently. He rocks back to pull Pargat Singh's first ball for six, prompting chants of “USA! USA! USA!”
Dilon Heyliger turns the screw to claim the critical wicket of USA skipper Monank Patel for Canada
Shreyas Movva made a quick-fire 32 not out from only 16 balls as Canada set the USA a target of 195 in the T20 World Cup opener
Others: USA celebrate T20 World Cup debut in style with stirring victory over Canada
That wicket was a result of the previous ball and the pressure that Canada have applied. The USA are in serious bother here.
